title: Covid Cases Rise in Areas of US, CDC Sees 'Pandemic of the Unvaccinated'
content:
1. Covid Cases Rise in Areas of US, CDC Sees 'Pandemic of the Unvaccinated'  Bloomberg
  2. Covid-19 'is becoming a pandemic of the unvaccinated,' CDC director says  CNN
  3. CDC Director Walensky Declares Covid a 'Pandemic of the Unvaccinated'  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. Delta COVID variant, now dominant worldwide, drives surge of U.S. deaths - officials  Yahoo News
  5. CDC Director Walensky Warns Of 'Pandemic Of The Unvaccinated'  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国の各地域でコヴィド感染者が増加、CDCは「ワクチンを打たない人のパンデミック」と見ている
美国部分地区的科维德病例上升，CDC认为是 "未接种疫苗的大流行"。
美國部分地區的科維德病例上升，CDC認爲是 "未接種疫苗的大流行"。
